shortdesc.p: Founded in November of 2016 and based in Blacksburg, Virginia, Airclassroom is a trusted community marketplace for people to list, discover, and book unique accommodations around Montgomery County, online or from an iPhone or iPad.
Students who are pursuing a masters or a doctorate degree at university have certain classroom needs that Airclassroom can fulfill!
This section will describe how a customer pays for the room he or she has reserved using the Airclassroom service.

topic.title: How to Turn on the Lights

shortdesc.p: This section will describe how a customer turns on the overhead lighting in an Airclassroom rental.

topic.title: How to Turn on the iMac

shortdesc.p: This section will describe how a customer turns on an iMac located in one of the Shanks Hall Airclassroom rentals.

topic.title: How to Turn on the Projector

shortdesc.p: This section will describe how a customer uses the projector in an Airclassroom rental.

topic.title: How to Properly Sit in an Office Chair

shortdesc.p: This section will describe how a customer should adjust his or her body to properly sit in a chair in an Airclassroom rental.
